achievements.name: I'll Be Right There
achievements.description: Revive 10 friendly players in one match

achievements.name: One More, Lord!
achievements.description: Revive 25 friendly players in one match

achievements.name: Desmond Doss
achievements.description: Revive 50 friendly players in one match

achievements.name: A Lovely Day At The Beach
Professional Swimmer
achievements.description: Play 50 matches on Purple Heart Lane

achievements.name: Praise The Lord And Pass The Ammunition
Bad Nade! Bad Nade!
achievements.description: Kill yourself with your own grenade

achievements.name: We May Have Lost The Battle...
Stayin' Alive!
achievements.description: Be the last player alive in your squad

achievements.name: Death From Below
achievements.description: Destroy a vehicle with an AT mine

achievements.name: The Red Ball Express
achievements.description: Drop 250 Supply Boxes from a Supply Truck

achievements.name: To The Village Of My Babushka
Silent, But Deadly!
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies with a knife without dying

achievements.name: Ace Of Spades
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies with a spade without dying

achievements.name: It's Not The Size That Matters...
achievements.description: Kill a Sniper with a Pistol

achievements.name: Command And Conquer!
achievements.description: As Commander, kill the enemy Commander

achievements.name: Overachiever!
achievements.description: Be the highest scoring squadmate at the end of the match

achievements.name: Jack Of All Trades!
achievements.description: Be the highest scoring teammate at the end of the match

achievements.name: Soldier of the Month
achievements.description: Be awarded 3x the commendation at the end of a match.

achievements.name: War Hero
achievements.description: Received a lifetime total of 250 commend points.

achievements.name: Medal of Honor
achievements.description: As US kill a total of 2000 enemies.

achievements.name: Iron Cross
achievements.description: As Ger kill a total of 2000 enemies.

achievements.name: Hero of the Soviet Union
achievements.description: As Soviet kill a total of 2000 enemies.

achievements.name: I spy, I spy, with my little eye...
achievements.description: Reveal the positions of 20 or more soldiers at once with the Recon ability.

achievements.name: Cleanup down aisle 3
achievements.description: Kill a soldier using the PTRS-41.

achievements.name: Geneva Genocide!
achievements.description: Kill a Medic of the enemy team while being a Medic.

achievements.name: There can only be one!
achievements.description: Kill an Officer of the enemy team while being an Officer.

achievements.name: One with the shadow...
achievements.description: Kill a Sniper of the enemy team while being a Sniper.

achievements.name: Spot On!
achievements.description: Kill a Spotter of the enemy team while being a Spotter.

achievements.name: Breaking the Geneva Convention
achievements.description: Kill an enemy medic while he is reviving someone.

achievements.name: And so it begins...
achievements.description: Get first blood in a match.

achievements.name: Rain Hell
achievements.description: Obliterate 10 enemies with a single Kaytushka Strike.

achievements.name: Beat the DEV (Medic)
achievements.description: Revive more than 63 players in one match.

achievements.name: I don't need no Nightvision Goggles!
achievements.description: Played a total of 25 matches on Nightmaps.

achievements.name: You can run, but you can't hide!
achievements.description: Spotted a total of 200 enemies with the Flare Guns.

achievements.name: MG goes BRRRR!
achievements.description: Kill 20 enemies with a Half-Track MG.

achievements.name: Who's Garry?
achievements.description: Destroyed 6 enemy Garrisons in one match.

achievements.name: Fast Track Delivery
achievements.description: Spawned a total of 100 times onto the battlefield through the Half Track.

achievements.name: Track and Trace
achievements.description: As Anti-Tank or Engineer, destroyed a fully occupied Half Track vehicle.

achievements.name: One Hit Wonder!
achievements.description: Hit a moving target with the precision strike.

achievements.name: Firestarter
achievements.description: Getting burned by a flamethrower, molotov or flare gun.

achievements.name: Medium-Rare
achievements.description: Burned 5 enemies to a crisp in one match.

achievements.name: Extra Crispy Please
achievements.description: Burned 20 enemies to a crisp in one match.

achievements.name: Fight Fire with Fire
achievements.description: With the Flamethrower, killed an enemy that is also wielding the Flamethrower.

achievements.name: This Is a Flammenwerfer, It Werfs Flammen
achievements.description: Killed a total of 100 enemies with the Flamethrower.

achievements.name: Hans! Get Ze Flammenwerfer!
achievements.description: Killed a total of 500 enemies with the Flamethrower.

achievements.name: Disco Inferno!
achievements.description: Killed a total of 1000 enemies with the Flamethrower.

achievements.name: Molotov Party!
achievements.description: Have thrown a total of 100 Molotovs.

achievements.name: Za Zdorovie!
achievements.description: Throw a Molotov for the first time.

achievements.name: Drop it Like Its Hot!
achievements.description: Drop 50 ammo boxes with a Jeep.

achievements.name: Dear Devs...
achievements.description: Watch the entire credits roll by.

achievements.name: Liar, Liar, Pants of Fire!
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies with a flamethrower without dying.

achievements.name: Like a Moth to a Flame...
achievements.description: Kill 10 enemies with molotovs without dying.

achievements.name: Get that Windshield Up!
achievements.description: Run over a total of 250 enemies with Jeeps.

achievements.name: Rollin' In The Jeep
achievements.description: In one match, run over 15 enemies with a Jeep.

achievements.name: You... Shall Not... Spawn!
achievements.description: Destroyed 5 enemy OPs in one life.

achievements.name: The Second Battle
achievements.description: Complete 50 matches on El Alamein Skirmish

achievements.name: No armor, read the rules
achievements.description: Destroy a tank on a Skirmish map match

achievements.name: Rule Breaker
achievements.description: Fill an armor squad in a Skirmish match

achievements.name: Clearing the board
achievements.description: As a commander kill 20 enemies with a single bombing run in a Skirmish match

achievements.name: Special operations
achievements.description: Spawn on an Airhead in a Skirmish match

achievements.name: French Summer
achievements.description: Complete 15 matches of Skirmish on Mortain

achievements.name: Holding the Line
achievements.description: Complete 10 matches of Warfare or Offensive on Mortain

achievements.name: Welcome to Mortain!
achievements.description: Complete a match on Mortain in any mode

achievements.name: Operation Lüttich
achievements.description: Win a match on Mortain in any mode

achievements.name: Counter-Attacker
achievements.description: Win 10 matches of Skirmish on Mortain

achievements.name: Blaze of Glory
achievements.description: Whilst injured, kill an enemy with a Flamethrower on Elsenborn Ridge

achievements.name: Hit the Road Jack
achievements.description: Drive or ride in vehicles for 1 hour on Elsenborn Ridge

achievements.name: Ultimate Price
achievements.description: Destroy an enemy garrison with a satchel on Elsenborn Ridge

achievements.name: Rations for the Ridge
achievements.description: As the Support role, drop 25 Supply Boxes on Elsenborn Ridge

achievements.name: See No Evil
achievements.description: Get killed whilst using Freelook on Elsenborn Ridge.

achievements.name: The Fortress Falls
achievements.description: Win a game of Warfare as the DAK on Tobruk

achievements.name: Dust and Glory
achievements.description: Win a game of Offensive as the British Eighth Army on Tobruk

achievements.name: Stoke the Fire
achievements.description: Place 15 AP or AT Mines across any mode on Tobruk

achievements.name: Desert Rat
achievements.description: As part of an Armor Unit, destroy a total of 25 enemy tanks across any mode on Tobruk

achievements.name: Eight for the Eighth
achievements.description: As the British, use the blowtorch to repair 8 vehicles across any mode on Tobruk.
